alert.note: Alert for Logan; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 8:43AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Logan, northeastern Yell and southern Pope Counties through 915 AM CST... At 842 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mosley, or near Danville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Danville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... London... Hector... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Broomfield... Mt Nebo State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Petit Jean River WMA... Mosley... Taral... Appleton... Ranger... Economy... Caglesville... Oak Grove in Pope County... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 74 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
